Ability.name: Basic Attack
Ability.description: A basic attack that does physical damage

Ability.name: Elemental Attack
Ability.description: An attack that does elemental damage. Specifically mentions one or more element(s)

Ability.name: Augment
Ability.description: Provides a beneficial modifier to the attributes and elements of yourself

Ability.name: Reduce
Ability.description: Provides a detrimental modifier to the attributes and elements of an enemy
